body.name: SAMSUNG S80UA 27-Inch ViewFinity 4K UHD (3840x2160) Computer Monitor, HDMI, USB Hub with USB-C, HDR10 (1 Billion Colors), Built-in Speakers, Height Adjustable Stand (LS27A80DUNNXZA)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 3 hrs 7 mins
features: EXCEPTIONAL PICTURE QUALITY: Hi-Res 4K UHD, IPS panel and HDR 10 allow you to explore every detail with 4x the pixels of a Full HD monitor; More screen real estate provides more space to view multiple tools, applications and programs.

1 BILLION COLORS WITH HDR10: With a range of colors, near limitless hues and HDR10, which makes dark colors darker and the brightest colors even brighter, all content becomes a joy to look at and experienced exactly as the creator intended

VERSATILE CONNECTIVITY: Enjoy multiple connectivity options with HDMI, DisplayPort, and USB-C - which functions as a display input, as well as provides up to 90W of power delivery to charge your laptop; A USB 3.0 hub allows you to connect multiple devices such as keyboards and mice directly to the display, freeing up clutter on your desk

INTELLIGENT EYE CARE: Eye Saver Mode and a flicker free smart adaptive picture setting keep eyes fresh and strain-free; For late-night projects, brightness and color temperature adjust in any environment, and protect against excessive blue light.
body.description: Samsung 27 Inch Hi-Res UHD Computer Monitor with IPS Panel features innovative displays that power your performance. Get four times the resolution of 1080p monitor to make small text easy to read, while details in photos, illustrations, and videos are easier to work with and see. It delivers superior picture quality, thanks to its IPS Panel, HDR10 and 1 billion colors, along with best-in-class and versatile connectivity. With Adaptive Picture, Eye Saver Mode and Flicker Free features, it provides intelligent eye care. The slim, minimalistic, borderless design and height adjustable stand (HAS) with tilt, swivel, and pivot functions allow for an ergonomic and clutter free setup in any workstation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Short Circuits the USB-C
reviews.reviewText: Edit: Updating to 1 star. I bought two of these displays and all of them are reporting the exact same serial number! How stupid is this. I don't understand how the Samsung brand would sell such displays.I’m using the USB-C for both data and power. But the monitor randomly turns off and on while not in use, and in doing so it somehow pulls so much power through the USB that my Mac’s short circuit protection kicks in with a warning saying that the USB accessory is disabled due to high power usage. The monitor was supposed to provide power over USB, so I don’t know that it’s doing and if it damaged my Mac.
